title.rendered: Is This Launch Monitor The Trackman Killer? Mevo Plus

content.rendered:
Is This Launch Monitor the Trackman Killer?

[tcb-script type=”text/javascript”](function (v, i, d, a, l, y, t, c, s) { y=’_’+d.toLowerCase();c=d+’L’;if(!v[d]){v[d]={};}if(!v[c]){v[c]={};}if(!v[y]){v[y]={};}var vl=’Loader’,vli=v[y][vl],vsl=v[c][vl + ‘Script’],vlf=v[c][vl + ‘Loaded’],ve=’Embed’; if (!vsl){vsl=function(u,cb){ if(t){cb();return;}s=i.createElement(“script”);s.type=”text/javascript”;s.async=1;s.src=u; if(s.readyState){s.onreadystatechange=function(){if(s.readyState===”loaded”||s.readyState==”complete”){s.onreadystatechange=null;vlf=1;cb();}};}else{s.onload=function(){vlf=1;cb();};} i.getElementsByTagName(“head”)[0].appendChild(s); };} vsl(l+’loader.min.js’,function(){if(!vli){var vlc=v[c][vl];vli=new vlc();}vli.loadScript(l+’player.min.js’,function(){var vec=v[d][ve];t=new vec();t.run(a);});});})(window, document, ‘Vidalytics’, ‘vidalytics_embed_zkXqGzmmpN_kOMG9’, ‘https://fast.vidalytics.com/embeds/PqrXMwxV/zkXqGzmmpN_kOMG9/’);[/tcb-script]

COUPON ‘CLAY2’ AT CHECKOUT FOR 5% OFF!

Click the big button below to visit our partner’s site and use the coupon code “Clay2” at checkout to get a special discounted price. PLUS I’ll send you a 3-part bonus video series to show you how to get the best results the fastest with the Mevo+ .  Just to be upfront… I’ll earn a small percentage on any purchase you make. That’ll help us keep making more great content for you!

The Mevo+ With Pro Package Will Have You Focused on the Right Things to Work On In Your Swing

Instead of wasting time on the wrong things…

In the last year, FlightScope put out the Mevo+ with a special upgrade–called the “Pro Package”–and you can get all the data of the club coming through contact… including:

  • Ball Speed
  • Club Head Speed
  • Smash Factor
  • Carry Distance
  • Launch Angle
  • Spin Rate
  • Apex Height
  • Flight Time
  • Angle of Attack
  • Spin Loft
  • Launch Direction
  • Spin Axis
  • Roll Distance
  • Total Distance
  • Lateral Landing
  • Shot Dispersion
  • Shot Type
  • Face to Path
  • Face to Target
  • Dynamic Loft
  • Club Path
  • Vertical Swing Plane
  • Horizontal Swing Plane
  • Low Point
  • Vertical Descent Angle
  • Curve
  • Club Speed Profile
  • Club Acceleration Profile

The Mevo+ With the Pro Package Can Do What $18,000 Launch Monitors Can Do… For a Fraction of the Price

In the past, if you wanted to get the same data that the Mevo+ with Pro Package can provide, and specifically the data of the club coming through contact, then you’d have to pay at least $18,000…

As a result, you can now get the feedback you need to work on your golf game for a fraction of that cost—and, for the next two days, 5% OFF the normal price!

If you purchase through our special link, you can get the FlightScope Mevo+ Golf Launch Monitor with the “Pro Package” at this special price, PLUS you’ll receive our EXCLUSIVE 3 BONUS VIDEOS (not available anywhere else)… and they’re ONLY available for this special 2-day end-of-summer sale!

More on the bonus videos…

These bonus videos are not available anywhere else

Get the Most From Your Mevo+ “Pro Package” With This Exclusive Bonus Video Series

3-Video Bonus Trainings

It’s great to have all of this valuable information at your fingertips… but how do you take advantage of it??

I’ve got you covered with my 3 bonus video series. You’ll discover what numbers you should be striving for, and drills to achieve them.

Also, you’ll discover…

  • Why reading your ball flight without the Mevo+ could lead you to fixing the WRONG thing in your swing–and how it’ll help you fix and diagnose the right thing much quicker.
  • The one angle to know that virtually eliminates penalty strokes from your score card.
  • The number YOU MUST get right if you want to make ball-then-turf contact on a consistent basis.
  • The two metrics you need to combine so you’ll instantly know how to hit power fades and baby draws on command.
  • The ONE THING you must know when switching from a practice mat to real grass so that you don’t actually make things worse.
  • The breakthrough that uncovers the REAL reason your shot dispersion can go haywire (and how to tighten it up).
  • Which swing factors matter the most to hitting a “perfect shot.”
  • The secret training method that’ll get you improving 10x faster.
  • The “Big Four” swing metrics you need to sharpen so you’ll be playing better than your buddies.

ACT NOW To Get Your Mevo+ with the Pro Package AND 3 Bonus Videos!

Click the big button below to visit our partner’s site to get the special discounted price I’ve secured for you– PLUS 3 bonus videos! Just to be upfront… I’ll earn a small percentage on any purchase you make. That’ll help us keep making more great content for you!

COUPON ‘CLAY2’ AT CHECKOUT FOR 5% OFF!
